descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow] -=DAGGERCRAFT=-[/color]

                             [color=red]ENDORSE IT, IF YOU LIKE IT! THANK YOU! [/color]


  [color=red]Stop updating separated version
Please download the daggercraftpackage [/color]
---------------------------------------------
  [color=yellow]DaggerCraftPackage[/color][color=red] is released!! 
You can download HERE:[/color]
 [color=yellow]
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6494[/color]
---------------------------------------------


My fourth dagger,
Simple yet elegant! revealed a killing with Gorgeous!!
Hope you like it!!

with 2048 HD textures```and detailed

First released at http://game.ali213.net/thread-3872843-1-1.html

There are a lot of one-handed weapons mods and two-handed weapons mods, but the little dagger mods. I do love daggers, so I made a dagger mod for owe use.
Now just to share.

U Can build it in the deadric smithing list.
Or using Console command :
player.additem xx5544d4 1 (xx is the load order num of the mod)

The base damage is 12 (same as blade of woe)
When created with 100 smithing and you have 100 one-handed, the damage will be 36

Free to improve it with grindstones and enchant it!!


and I recommend my another dagger mods:

shard of azzinoth:
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4683[/color]

dagger of time:
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5379[/color]

mutilator:
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6063[/color]

XIV\'s Bloody Shanker
[color=green]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=6462[/color]

---------------------
Installation:
---------------------

Extract to skyrim\\data\\
and enable the ESP in SkyrimLauncher or NMM
author: faxivcm
